remarks: Ordering in a structure power.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Aug-2015.)
statement:
pwsle.y $e |- Y = ( R ^s I ) $.
pwsle.v $e |- B = ( Base ` Y ) $.
pwsle.o $e |- O = ( le ` R ) $.
pwsle.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` Y ) $.
pwsle $p |- ( ( R e. V /\ I e. W ) -> .<_ = ( oR O i^i ( B X. B ) ) ) $.
